dct_title_s: New map of that portion of North America, exhibiting the United States and territories, the Canadas, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, and Mexico, also Central America, and the West India Islands : compiled from the most recent surveys and authentic sources
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights. Prime meridians: Greenwich and Washington, D.C. Includes world map inset, notes, list of U.S. counties and county towns, table of distances, and ill.
dct_publisher_sm: Baltimore, Md. : Jacob Monk, 1854 (Engraved & printed by A. Hoen & Co.)
